latest.title: DMC Deal Update
latest.content:
22 Apr 2025 12:03
RNS Number : 6966F
Valereum PLC
22 April 2025
This announcement contains information which, prior to its disclosure, was inside information as stipulated under Regulation 11 of the Market Abuse (Amendment) (EU Exit) Regulations 2019/310 (as amended). Upon the publication of this announcement via a Regulatory Information Service, this inside information is now considered to be in the public domain.
​
22/04/25
Valereum Plc
("Valereum", "VLRM" or the "Company")
DMC Deal Update
Valereum Plc
(AQSE: VLRM)
announces that it will no longer proceed with the previously proposed investment by DMC Markets Inc, via Valereum Inc, for a total consideration of £19 million.
The Company's decision follows extensive due diligence and prolonged negotiations over several months. Despite repeated assurances, it ultimately became clear that DMC was not in a position to complete the transaction.
While the outcome is disappointing, Valereum will continue to find opportunities that can protect shareholder interests and promote growth and further announcements will follow in due course.
The Board remains confident in the Company's ability to deliver shareholder value through its own distinctive path, one built on technology, regulatory readiness, and strategic independence.

latest.title: VLRM Markets to Commence Operations
latest.content:
24 Apr 2025 15:43
RNS Number : 1097G
Valereum PLC
24 April 2025
24/04/2025
Valereum Plc
("Valereum", "VLRM" or the "Company")
VLRM Markets to Commence Operations
Valereum Plc (AQSE: VLRM) is pleased to announce that it has instructed VLRM Markets S.A. de C.V. (VLRM Markets), a subsidiary of Valereum Plc, to commence operations, open its Real-World Asset (RWA) Platform and launch its V-Wallet.
VLRM Markets is licensed and regulated as a Digital Asset Service Provider (DASP) by the Comisión Nacional de Activos Digitales (CNAD) in El Salvador. Its license enables VLRM Markets to operate a comprehensive RWA ecosystem under El Salvador's progressive regulatory framework, including:
●
RWA Platform
- A platform for digital asset creation, primary issuance, and secondary trading of tokenised real-world assets.
●
V-Wallet
- A user-friendly interface for interacting with the RWA Platform, enabling the purchase, storage, and transfer of digital assets, including stablecoins, cryptocurrencies, and utility tokens.
●
VLRM Markets PRO
- Tailored services for professional clients, including trading, brokerage, OTC, and custody of digital and tokenised assets.
VLRM Markets is building a growing network of prospective issuers in multiple jurisdictions and, in particular, Central America (including Costa Rica, Guatemala, Panama and El Salvador), spanning industries such as real estate, infrastructure, transportation, hospitality, hotel and leisure, food and beverages, the arts, sports (various), agriculture, and more.
Operations are expected to commence during May 2025, with both the RWA Platform and V-Wallet becoming operational.
Adrian Hogg, Head of VLRM Markets, comments:
"I am absolutely delighted that we have received instruction from the Board to open the RWA Platform and launch the V-Wallet. This is a pivotal moment for VLRM Markets as we are set to launch an exciting range of tokenised RWA products that will bring innovation to the marketplace. We look forward to delivering unique opportunities to both issuers and investors alike."
For more information, and the chance to have your questions directly answered by the management team, please head to our interactive investor hub via:

latest.title: El Salvador delegation & SEC discuss collaboration
latest.content:
25 Apr 2025 07:00
RNS Number : 1360G
Valereum PLC
25 April 2025
25/04/2025
Valereum Plc
("Valereum", "VLRM" or the "Company")
El Salvador delegation discusses cross-border collaboration with SEC
Valereum Plc
(AQSE: VLRM)
is excited to share the news that Carmen Elena Ochoa de Medina, Head of El Salvador, VLRM Markets S.A. de C.V. (VLRM Markets), was part of an exclusive four-person delegation that met the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) on 22 April 2025. The meeting focused on exploring collaboration opportunities, including the potential to establish a cross-border digital asset regulatory sandbox.
The aims of the sandbox include the testing and development of digital asset products under the regulatory oversight of both U.S. and Salvadoran authorities, with an emphasis on two key pilot programs:
● Real estate tokenisation: A U.S. licensed broker working with a Salvadoran tokenisation firm to launch real estate tokenisation projects.
● Small business capital raising: A Salvadoran small business raising capital through tokenised equity, in collaboration with a U.S. licensed broker-dealers.
The delegation to the SEC meeting included Carmen Elena Ochoa de Medina, of VLRM Markets, as well as the President of El Salvador's Comisión Nacional de Activos Digitales (CNAD), a partner of Perkin Law Firm, and a former partner of Goldman Sachs. Carmen's participation underscores VLRM Markets' commitment to leading innovation in the digital asset space and its support for the ongoing global push for digital asset tokenisation.
SEC Chair Paul Atkins' Commitment to Digital Asset Regulation
Following his swearing-in on 21 April 2025, SEC Chair Paul Atkins emphasised his aim to establish a "firm regulatory foundation for digital assets." He stated: "
A top priority of my chairmanship will be to provide a firm regulatory foundation for digital assets through a rational, coherent and principled approach. We will work to ensure that the United States is the best and most secure place in the world to invest and to do business.
"
Adrian Hogg, Head of VLRM Markets, comments:
"We are thrilled that Carmen participated in this inaugural meeting with the SEC. Being part of such a prestigious delegation and having the opportunity to contribute to the conversation with the SEC is an important step for VLRM Markets. It showcases our commitment to playing a leading role in the global digital asset tokenisation."

latest.title: Placing of £0.5 Million via Clear Capital Markets
latest.content:
8 May 2025 07:00
RNS Number : 7869H
Valereum PLC
08 May 2025
This announcement contains information which, prior to its disclosure, was inside information as stipulated under Regulation 11 of the Market Abuse (Amendment) (EU Exit) Regulations 2019/310 (as amended). Upon the publication of this announcement via a Regulatory Information Service, this inside information is now considered to be in the public domain.
08/05/25
Valereum Plc
("Valereum", "VLRM" or the "Company")
Placing of
£0.5 Million via Clear Capital Markets
Valereum Plc (AQSE: VLRM) is pleased to announce a placing by Clear Capital Markets for a total of 12.5 million new ordinary shares of £0.001 each in the capital of the Company (the "
Placing Shares
") at an issue price of £0.04 per Placing Share (the "
Placing Price
"), raising gross proceeds of £500,000 (before expenses) (the "
Placing
").
The Placing Price represents a discount of approximately 22% to the average closing price of £0.5125 per share on the 4 days prior to entering into the agreement. The Placing is expected to complete by 14 May 2025 and is conditional only on the Placing Shares being admitted
to trading on the AQSE Growth Market
.
This Placing will provide additional working capital for VLRM to support the launch and scaling of its digital asset services, particularly its RWA Markets business.
The Board remains confident in the Company's ability to deliver shareholder value through its own distinctive path, one built on technology, regulatory readiness, and strategic independence.
Warrant Issue
In association with the capital raise, the Company has granted warrants to advisers
to subscribe for 1,000,000 new ordinary shares at an exercise price of £0.04 per share for a period of 3 years.
James Formolli, Chairman of Valereum Plc, commented:
"Bringing in external investors represents a strong endorsement of the Company's vision and long-term potential. This new capital allows Valereum to move forward at pace, strengthens our balance sheet, and provides the resources needed for us to explore the exciting opportunities ahead."
The Company looks forward to updating the market on further developments in due course.
Admission:
Application will be made for the new Placing Shares, which will rank pari passu with the existing Ordinary Shares in issue, to be admitted to trading on the AQSE Growth Market ("Admission"). Dealings are expected to commence on or around 14 May 2025 and the issue is subject only to Admission.
Total voting rights:
Following the issuance of the Placing Shares, the Company's total number of Ordinary Shares in issue will be 185,409,716. This figure may be used by shareholders as the denominator for the calculation to determine if they are required to notify the Company of their interest in, or a change to their interest in, the Company's securities pursuant to the Company's Articles.

latest.title: VLRM Markets to Launch Digital Asset Services
latest.content:
15 May 2025 14:59
RNS Number : 8905I
Valereum PLC
15 May 2025
15/05/25
Valereum Plc
("Valereum", "VLRM" or the "Company")
VLRM Markets: Launching Digital Asset Services into
Sports, Lifestyle, Leisure & Hospitality
Valereum Plc (AQSE: VLRM) is pleased to announce that VLRM Markets is embarking on an evolutionary journey with the official launch of its RWA Platform later this month. As a licensed and regulated Digital Asset Service Provider in El Salvador, we are initially prioritising the country's
Sports, Lifestyle, Leisure & Hospitality
vertical.
This initial phase will introduce a range of aspirational projects and partnerships, including:
● Engaging with
Football
,
Skydiving
,
Mountain Biking
,
Surfing
, and
Golf
initiatives
● Collaborating with
Beverage Distribution
and
Food Businesses
● Tokenisation of
Sunday Times Best-Selling
Author's royalties
● Exploring
Ride-Hailing
services for leisure enthusiasts
Valereum's strategy is to phase these initiatives into our platform gradually across the coming weeks. Specific details and announcements about each offering will be shared as we progress. This approach ensures a steady, sustainable rollout, reflecting our commitment to building a robust marketplace for real-world asset tokenisation.
Phase one focuses on El Salvador, where VLRM Markets headquarters, licensing, and operations are based, with the plan to then roll out our offerings globally. Subsequent verticals, including
Real Estate
,
TradFi
, and
Arts
, will arrive through the pipeline through the second half of this year.
Follow Valereum on socials for more updates and join us on this exciting journey as we evolve and expand our business and offerings.
For more information, and the chance to have your questions answered by the management team, please head to our interactive investor hub via:
